price: 19. Ir kad tada, kai Allaho Tarnas (t. y. Pranašas ﷺ ) atsistojo maldaudamas Jo, jie beveik tapo aplink jį susigrūdusia minia.“
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu lammā qāma ʿabdu al-lahi yadʿūhu kādū yakūnūna ʿalayhi libadan
